name: Morning Never Comes (itch) (SkellySoft)
description:
Early playable beta version. Content Warning for: Smoking, Bad language.

Features four locations, 6 interactive NPCs to talk to (7 if you count the concierge), grabbable goofy physics (including a basketball minigame!), working inventory and items to collect, functioning interactive screens, and more!

Inspired by Retro-Futuristic Cyberpunk works like MegaRace and Ripper, along with  interactive walking simulators like Tales from Off-Peak City, this project is part Adventure Game, part walking simulator - and will hopefully on next release, feature some simple stealth elements as well. Currently this is just an early version of the game to gauge peoples interest in such a project - so please, feel free to leave me some feedback either here or over on social media!

Supports both Keyboard & Mouse and Gamepad. The game might stammer a little bit when it first loads due to some real-time shader compilation, will get it fixed as soon as I can figure out how to get a definitive list of *all* materials.

Have fun and please let me know what you think!
